body:
Comment 1 by **julian@quantumfyre.co.uk**: 
The attached patch fixes the link.  However, it does this by changing the compilation
output - and I don't know enough about the object format to know if this change is 100%
correct ...

I think that the basic approach is correct - a //line comment pushes a new z (with
associated fs) onto the stack, followed by a Z, so the z needs to be "popped" - and at
the end of the containing file seems the appropriate place?

I don't think that the linker has enough information to fix up the line number table
after the fact?
Attachments: 1. dwarfbug.patch (582 bytes)
